Varnish User Day at La Défense: Auditorium Tour Europlaza (La Défense 4), 20 Rue André Prothin, 92400 Courbevoie, France
**Varnish Developer Day at Suresnes**: Capgemini Technology Services, 7 Rue Frédéric Clavel, 92150 Suresnes, France.
`Access Map (transportation, GPS) here . Do please use it! <https://www.varnish-cache.org/news/files/Seine-Etoile_Access_Map_0.pdf>`_

Varnish User Day at La Défense: All Varnish Cache Users, Developers, Administrators, Web Architects and other techies wanting to know more about the software and how it is used by others.
**Varnish Developer Day at Suresnes**: Tailored only for C developers working on the Varnish Cache core, Varnish Tools, Varnish Modules (aka VMODs) or any software related to these. **Remember: This is a Highly Technical Meeting!**
